name: Morga (manga)
description: Revealing her true identity to Naru in a rather grisly manner, Morga continued to asphyxiate Naru and threatened to kill her mother as well, untilSailor Moonmakes her timely appearance at the store. In her true Youma form, Morga reawakened her affected humans to defend her. She is defeated after Sailor Moon's cry emitsSupersonic Wavesfrom herhair pieces, temporarily incapacitating Morga and the affected humans, giving her enough time to destroy Morga with herMoon Frisbee. Everyone in the jewe...

name: Ittou Asanuma (manga)
description: Itto Asanuma(浅沼 一等,Asanuma Ittō) is a supporting character in the manga. He is a high school student who looks up toMamoru Chiba. In the Materials Collection, it is revealed that Asanuma has a home in Sendaikazue and is the only child of his family.

attributes.Affiliates: Mamoru Chiba Makoto Kino Kotono Sarashina

name: Princess D (manga)
description: She owned a well known, legendary treasure that Queen Beryl and Luna thought might possibly be the Silver Crystal and that she could be the Moon Princess. For a short time, she had been possessed Nephrite's youma shadow, which controlled her body into working for the Dark Kingdom. In the original manga, the crystal was later revealed to be a statue of Princess D, and in the revised manga the crystal was a statue of D Kingdom's first princess.

attributes.Japanese: プリンセス ダイヤ

description: Artemis(アルテミス, Arutemisu) isMinako Aino'swhite guardian cat, as well as her adviser inCodename: Sailor Vand theSailor Moonmanga. He is the one who found Minako and trained her asSailor Vand has continued to watch over her ever since.

name: Chuu-Chuu
description: While in disguise Chuu-Chuu has long hair, a shirt and tie, and a doctors coat. In her true form, Chuu-Chuu has the same hair, a sleeveless top with a slit on her chest, shorts and patterned tights. She has short black gloves and a thick dark belt. Her mosquito features are her wings, which are between her back and bottom and her antennae.

attributes.First Manga Appearance: Vol.13 Pet Chapter 3 - Chuu Chuu's Schemes

name: Otakura
description: Otakura's name is derived from "otaku", referring to "house". But, more likely, refers to "geek" or "nerd", as the pawn shop's frequent customers were otakus.

attributes.Death: Eternal Sailor Moon and Eternal Sailor Chibi Moon's Starlight Honeymoon Double Therapy Kiss

name: Ptilol (manga)
description: Ptilol(プチロル,Puchiroru) andCyprineare the 5th members of the Witches 5 to appear in theInfinity Arc. According to theMaterials Collection, the two of them made up one person, but they would split when it was time to battle against an enemy. She along with Cyprine, are level 999 witches, making them both the most powerful members of the Witches 5.

attributes.Affiliates: Cyprine Kaolinite

name: Princess Kakyuu / Sailor Kakyuu (manga)
description: Princess Kakyu(火球皇女,KakyūKōjo) is the princess of the planetKinmokuand that planet'sSailor GuardianSailor Kakyu(セーラー火球, SērāKakyū). She fled toEarthafter her planet was destroyed by theShadow Galacticaempire in themanga.

attributes.Japanese: 火球皇女 かきゅうプリンセス (Hiragana) セーラー火球
attributes.Romaji: Kakyū Kōjo Kakyū Purinsesu Sērā Kakyū
attributes.Affiliates: Sailor Starlights Chibi Chibi Eternal Sailor Moon

name: DeVleene
description: DeVleene has light, short, curly hair and is plus size in stature. She wears a maid-like uniform with a top with poofy sleeves on her forearms, a lacy collar, a bow at her neck and a lacy heart below it. Her skirt is short and black with suspenders over her shoulders with a lace underskirt. On her skirt is a lacy heart shaped apron with a bow at the back and she wears heels.

attributes.Mission: Selling candy that made whoever ate it overweight and unhealthy and opening up a spa that would drain the energy out of the clients who went there.
attributes.Death: Sailor V's Sailor V Chop and Crescent Slender Beam

name: Sailor Lead Crow (manga)
description: Lead is element number 82 on the periodic table. The words "lead" and "red" are written the same way in katakana, which is why Lead Crow's outfit and hair have a reddish hue and why TokyoPop mistranslated her name as "Sailor Red Crow" in theoriginal releaseof the manga.

attributes.Japanese: セーラー レッド クロウ
attributes.Affiliates: Sailor Phi Phobos and Deimos Sailor Galaxia

name: Queen Metalia (manga)
description: Queen Metalia is portrayed as just an amorphous energy being in both the manga and the anime. However, in the manga, she takes on a more humanoid appearance as a shadowed human body. As she gets more powerful, she begins to spread around the world, like a dark cloud. However, her "heart" is located above her eyes, and the mark becomes more prominent as she becomes bigger.

attributes.Relations: Incarnation of Chaos : Wiseman Pharaoh 90 Queen Nehelenia
attributes.Affiliates: Queen Beryl

name: Garoben (manga)
description: Garoben (who was unnamed in the manga) was sent byJadeiteand ran theCrystal Seminarwhere she promised students that they would become geniuses. But she used the computer program to brainwash the students to become minions of theDark Kingdom. Sailor Moon found out about the program and went to the Seminar, disguised as a nurse to rescue the students. The yoma used papers to attack Sailor Moon and held Ami hostage. Ami's pen glowed and the sign of Mercury appeared on her forehead, causing a col...

attributes.Mission: To drain energy from the Crystal Seminar students

name: Snow Dancer
description: Snow dancers are slim humanoids with bodies made out of ice. Their hair reaches their nose at the front and they have clear blue eyes. They have short flowing hair and semi-transparent skirts that go down to their ankles. Their hands have small balls on the ends of their fingers, and their heeled shoes have these same balls on their toes.

attributes.Death: Killed by multiple Sailor Guardian attacks

name: Touhi-chan
description: Tohi-chan has light-colored hair in two spiral buns covering her ears. She wears a short dress with spiral patterns on the bottom and on her shoulders. She has long sleeves that hide her hands and wears no shoes. While in disguise as a shop worker she wears the same dress with an apron over it.

name: Dark Guys
description: Dark Guys(ダークガイズ, Dāku Gaizu) is an idol group that consists of three identical men who are represented by theDark Agencyinthe 5th chapter ofCodename: Sailor V. They are "big brothers" ofTwin Darkand actually clones ofFluoritealong withDark Shizuka-himeand their "sisters".

attributes.First Manga Appearance: Vol.5 The Machinations of the Dark Agency

name: Nephrite's Alter Ego
description: In the original anime, when not possessing a person, Nephrite's Soul Shadow is a simple amalgamation of purple energy. Near the top of it is a stylized version of Nephrite's head, which is completely red. His hand can also be seen emerging red at one point.

attributes.Mission: Posses Princess D and acquire the Silver Crystal
attributes.First Anime Appearance: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

name: Shingo Tsukino (manga)
description: Shingo Tsukino(月野 進悟,Tsukino Shingo)is the son ofKenji TsukinoandIkuko Tsukino. He is alsoUsagi Tsukino's younger brother.

attributes.Resides: Usagi's Home , Azabu-Juban , Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan

name: Kyuusuke Sarashina (manga)
description: In the manga, Kyusuke lived in a shop that sold soba, his favorite food, and he had an elder sister,Kotono Sarashina, who made a Sailor V button for him. WhenChibiusaadmired the button Kyusuke refused to get her one, but after the two of them helped defeat the vampireLilica Hubert, he had his sister make aSailor Moonbutton for her. He was also friends withGurio Sorano, and he seemed to think Sorano should be more athletic.

attributes.Affiliates: Chibiusa Tuskino , Momoko Momohara , Gurio Sorano
attributes.First Manga Appearance: Chibiusa's Picture Diary Chapter 1 - Beware of the Transfer Student

name: Mii
description: In the manga, Mii has dark-colored hair tied into low pigtails, and she also carried a school bag. In crystal, Mii has brown hair tied into high pigtails and green eyes. She wore a light green blouse, a white knee-length skirt, white socks, and pink shoes, and carried a red school bag.

attributes.Affiliates: Rei Hino

name: Natsuna Sakurada
description: Natsuna Sakurada(桜田 夏菜, Sakurada Natsuna) is a character who only appears in theCodename: Sailor VManga. She is the Superintendent-General of the Metropolitan Police Board and a closetSailor Vfan. She goes through many lengths to meet Sailor V and wants her to work side-by-side with her on the police force and she even keeps a signed poster of Sailor V that she looks at when no one is in her office.

attributes.Affiliates: Toshio Wakagi , Minako Aino
attributes.First Manga Appearance: Vol.4 The Ambition of Petite Pandora

description: Maiku is very weak physically and Minako tries to encourage him to exercise anyway. After an operation, he becomes healthy again but he informs Minako that he is engaged to a Russian girl he knows, destroying another one of her many crushes.

description: Petz is named for the mineralpetzite, which is generally found with deposits of rare minerals such as gold and silver, as well as with copper.

name: Haruna Sakurada (manga)
description: Haruna's first name contains the characters 春 (haru) and 菜 (na). The former means "spring" while the latter can mean "greens" or "vegetables". The characters of her surname are 桜 (sakura) and 田 (da), with the first meaning "cherry tree" or "cherry blossom" and the second meaning "rice field".

attributes.Jobs: English teacher at Juban Middle School
attributes.Affiliates: Her students

name: Pegasus / Helios (Manga and Crystal)
description: Helios(エリオス, Eriosu) is the guardian priest ofPrince Endymionand lives inElysionwhere he prays alongside theMaenads. He is cursed by theDead Mooninto the form of aPegasus. He is one of the main characters of the Dream arc in themangaandcrystal.
